-- Firedrill --

Firedrill nods, "Sure," He follows Melchana, all the while glancing 
around him at new surroundings, a sense of culture shock hits him 
momentarily, but he shrugs it off.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Melchana shoots a sideglance at him.
> 
> Melchana: Yes, is it not? The feeling of the reformatting ritual 
is 
> also a... strong experience. We had to reformat the whole 
landscape in 
> order to power to our base. Follow me. My brother is waiting for 
us 
> now. Do you want to meet him before you go to the Renewal Chamber?
> 
> She rises from the piloting seat and slowly walks out.
